title: (x) "A4-star owner rating" generic sans - Verdana/Tahoma {Jan E, Ulli Neutzling, Brett Jordan}
content:
Any idea what this may be. Obviously the client provided a low-res gif, so this is the best I can provide.

Thanks for any help!  
Andy

author: thevisualab

comments.content: It’s verdana, the ’4’ is the giveaway
